q: Can I use the menu if I have food restrictions?
a: The menu can be used by people with a gluten-free or lactose-free diet, vegetarians and vegans. The menu will only contain foods according to your diet.

q: Can children eat according to the menu?
a: The menu is not intended for children under 18 years of age.

q: Is the diet suitable for me if I want to lose weight?
a: Yes, the menu is also suitable for weight reduction. You will be in a slight caloric deficit so that the weight loss is sustainable and you do not feel hungry.

q: Is the diet suitable for me if I want to gain weight?
a: Yes, the menu is also suitable for users who aim to gain weight. We will recommend nutritionally valuable foods that support the growth of muscle mass.

q: Can pregnant women use the menu?
a: Yes, if your doctor hasn't advised you a diet. We recommend that you choose to maintain your weight or gain weight as a goal and take care of sufficient food intake.

q: How does the menu calculate my recommended daily calorie intake?
a: We use the Harris-Benedict equation to determine basal metabolism. Not only the user's age, height and weight are taken into account, but also their activity, type of job and goals.
